description:
Adapt your bindings on the fly to suit the ever-changing conditions and terrain. With four settings you can finely tune your grip and glide without taking off your boots. Shift it forward to enhance grip on steeper tracks or move it back to maximize your gliding performance.

  • 4 different settings let you customize your grip and glide
  • Classic flexors offer excellent power transfer and allow for tool-free replacement
  • Compatible with IFP mounting plate only
name: Rossignol Move Switch Bindings - Unisex
